EmailTemplate.subject: =?utf-8?Q?=F0=9F=92=B8_Reduce_Your_Cloud_Bill_in_5_Steps=21?=
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With public cloud adoption growing rapidly, it’s becoming increasingly clear that a plan to optimize your existing footprint is no longer a “nice-to-have.”
But, while many cloud “best practices” suggest optimizing the “low hanging fruit,” the most advanced cloud organizations are going beyond surface-level optimization and unlocking world-class cost savings in the public cloud.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]>
Join us on April 3rd at 11 am for our webinar where Mor Cohen-Tal, Cloud CTO at Turbonomic, discusses the 5 steps to cloud optimization:
- Understanding your Applications - Understanding the Cloud Catalog - Defining Guardrails & Optimizing Low Hanging Fruit - and more!
I hope you'll join us! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-reduce-cloud-bill/]]>and we will send you the recording afterward.
